title: Grilled Ribeye Steak
content: Juicy ribeye grilled to perfection, seasoned with sea salt and rosemary butter.
food_steps: Season the steak with salt and pepper
Grill over high heat for 6 minutes per side
Rest before serving with herb butter

title: House Caesar Salad
content: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with Caesar dressing, croutons, and shaved parmesan.
food_steps: Toss with Caesar dressing and croutons
Top with parmesan and cracked pepper

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
content: Rich molten chocolate cake with a warm gooey center, served with vanilla ice cream.
food_steps: Bake until outer layer is firm

title: Fresh Squeezed Lemonade
content: Tangy and refreshing lemonade made with real lemons and cane sugar.
